title: Bob and Caren and Ted and Janice
creator_credit: David Bowen, Charles Palmer and Parthenon Pictures
brief_description: A counseling film for high school students which shows four young people as they consider a vocational career as one way to meet today’s problems. The four characters are juxtaposed in a series of rapid switches back and forth as their individual problems are presented, developed and resolved. Cast: Doug Fulton, Sandra Aiena, Rodney Wallace and Kathleen Peveler. Original music by “Last Chance”.
